summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the Appliance Shop e-commerce platform. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend core functionality working well with minor UI interaction issues in admin modal.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay preventing login button clicks in some cases
ui_bugs.workaround: Force click works, backend authentication is functional

integration_issues.issue: Cart page redirects to homepage for unauthenticated users
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior for authentication-protected routes

passed_tests: All 25 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Add to cart functionality with success notifications
Product display with images, prices, and ratings
Admin API endpoints (product and order management)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay issue in AuthModal component to ensure reliable login button clicks. Consider adding z-index adjustments or click event handling improvements.
